Class BDDACLWrapper

java.lang.Object
application.wan.ndd.verifier.common.BDDACLWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BDDACLWrapper extends Object implements Serializable
Computes BDD for ACL rules and Forwardding rules Note: The true, false, bdd variables, the negation of bdd variables: their reference count are already set to maximal, so they will never be garbage collected. And no need to worry about the reference count for them.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • AndInBatch

      public int AndInBatch(int[] bddnodes)
      Parameters:
      bddnodes - - an array of bdd nodes
      Returns:
      - the bdd node which is the AND of all input nodes all temporary nodes are de-referenced. the input nodes are not de-referenced.

    • OrInBatch

      public int OrInBatch(int[] bddnodes)
      Parameters:
      bddnodes - - an array of bdd nodes
      Returns:
      - the bdd node which is the OR of all input nodes all temporary nodes are de-referenced. the input nodes are not de-referenced.
